item.title: OXYGEN
item.description:
DrugBank ID: db09140
DrugCentral: vapreotide
Synonymous :dioxygen | molecular oxygen | oxigeno gaseoso | oxygen usp | pure oxygen

(Z)-3-(4’-chlorobenzylidene)-thiochroman-4-one showed highest binding affinity to the protein.

32429235 Emerging evidence suggests that AMPK facilitates central and peripheral reflexes that coordinate breathing and oxygen supply, and contributes to the central regulation of feeding and food choice. […] We propose, therefore, that oxygen supply to the body is aligned with not only the quantity we eat, but also nutrient-based diet selection, and that the cell-specific expression pattern of AMPK subunit isoforms is critical to appropriate system alignment in this respect.
